text: Richard F. Larsen (born August 12, 1936) is an American politician. He was the 30th Lieutenant Governor of North Dakota from 1969 to 1973 under Governor William L. Guy. Larsen also was in the North Dakota House from 1965 to 1966 and the North Dakota Senate from 1967 to 1968.North Dakota Blue Book, 1989 ==References== Category:Lieutenant Governors of North Dakota Category:Living people Category:1936 births Category:People from Grand Forks, North Dakota Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians
title: Richard F. Larsen
